UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Functional divergence in shrimp anti-lipopolysaccharide factors (ALFs): from recognition of cell wall components to antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Rosa RD, Vergnes A, de Lorgeril J, Goncalves P, Perazzolo LM, Sauné L, Romestand B, Fievet J, Gueguen Y, Bachère E, Destoumieux-Garzón D

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aerococcus viridans CIP 104074(MIC=1.25µM),Bacillus megaterium(MIC=1.25µM),Bacillus megaterium CIP 6620(MIC=0.60µM),Corynebacterium stationis CIP 101282(MIC=10µM),Micrococcus luteus CIP 5345(MIC=1.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=>10µM),Escherichia coli SBS 363(MIC=5µM),Salmonella enterica CIP 5858(MIC=10µM),Vibrio alginolyticus CIP 103336T(MIC=>10µM),Vibrio harveyi E22(MIC=>10µM),Vibrio anguillarum V62(MIC=>10µM),Vibrio penaeicida AM101(MIC=>10µM),Vibrio nigripulchritudo SFn1(MIC=>10µM),Candida albicans(MIC=>10µM),Fusarium oxysporum(MIC=10µM),Rhizopus stolonifer(MIC=>10µM),Parastagonospora nodorum(MIC=10µM),Botrytis cinerea(MIC=>10µM)
